parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select whether to compress or decompress files.

parameters.name: input binary field(s)
parameters.description: Name of the input binary field(s) containing the file(s) to be compressed or decompressed.

parameters.name: output format
parameters.description: Select the format of the output file (gzip or zip).

parameters.name: file name
parameters.description: Name of the output file to be generated.

parameters.name: put output file in field
parameters.description: Name of the output binary field to store the file in.

parameters.name: output file prefix
parameters.description: Prefix to add to the output file (applicable for gzip format).

parameters.name: output prefix
parameters.description: Prefix to add to the decompressed files.
